subject: Data export for compliance audit
body:
Dear TaskFlow Support,

We need to export all our company data from TaskFlow for a compliance audit. This includes:

- All task histories
- User activity logs
- Attachments and documents
- Comments and discussions

Can you provide instructions on how to do a complete data export? Is there a bulk export feature?

This is time-sensitive as our audit is scheduled for next week.

Regards,
Jennifer Martinez
Compliance Officer
